title: Orion ODA System and Architecture
summary: Comprehensive overview of the Orion Ontology-Driven Architecture (ODA). Covers the transition to Antigravity Kernel v6.0 (Native Edition), featuring RSIL-enforced protocols (Planning, Audit, Execution), and anti-hallucination verification. Includes detailed specifications for the 3-Stage Planning Protocol and end-to-end case studies on applying ODA governance to data structural analysis tasks (e.g., analyze_xlsx_structure.py), documenting the full lifecycle from blueprinting to successful implementation and isolated verification. Validated against Palantir AIP/Foundry (AI Ultra) standards.
